name: HJ: Sacrifice
description:
Professor Dr. Cherubs is a psychopathic doctor who try to find immortality.
Decides to sacrifice inmates with a magic book.
He did experiments on prisoners with the permission obtained from the Ministry of Justice.
Prisoners are not the slightest idea of ​​what will happen to them but they accept parole.

Your goal in the game, despite the danger to get escape of this prison
There is only one fact that you are not alone here.
Now you start the game as the only survivor and you only need just to run and escape by opening the doors of the prison you are locked individually.

REMEMBER!

Do not look behind you and run.
